generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide asphalt road with white lane markings and arrows, which is the main surface for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks visible on both sides of the road, particularly on the right side near the building, with pedestrians walking on them.
- building: Large modern buildings with glass facades and structural columns are visible on both sides of the street.
- vegetation: Numerous trees with green foliage are present along the sidewalks and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing partly cloudy.
- person: A few pedestrians can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides of the street.
- truck: A white truck is visible parked on the right side of the street near the building.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, with one showing a green light.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are mounted on poles, including a yellow diamond-shaped sign and a rectangular sign indicating "27a".
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked on the left side of the street near the parked cars.
